document.full_text: thousands of people protested in the syrian city of deraa on sunday as a government delegation arrived to pay condolences for victims killed by security forces in demonstrations for freedom this week, residents said.
document.title: thousands protest in syrian city for third day
lines_and_colors: thousands of people protested in the syrian city of deraa on sunday as a government delegation arrived to pay condolences for victims killed by security forces in demonstrations for freedom this week, residents said.
